name: Simon Severino
title: The Sales Booster
text: Seriously, @attio is the best CRM I have ever used. Recommending it to all clients these days. And I say this as a sales coach with 21 years experience in all top CRMs.

name: Philip Lakin
text: Dove into @attio today and I'm FLOORED. They have seriously nailed an "opinionated Airtable for CRM." Built-in enrichment, syncing with email + calendar, access/privacy controls, and the list goes on. They say they can power you from zero to IPO, and I actually believe them.

name: Erik Bernhardsson
text: Rare product endorsement but we just moved to @attio from Hubspot and it's like moving to Linear from Jira

name: Jono Bacon
text: Let's be honest, most CRMs suck. Overcomplicated, expensive, and you have to bend to their will...not the other way around. I am a huge fan of @attio - their product is rock-solid, customer support is AAA, and it is *very* flexible and simple. attio.com

name: Martin Riedel
text: CRM software sucks. If don't want to use a tool everyday that sucks energy because of its complexity. just shifted to @attio which really seems to do sales less painful. so far, I love it!

name: Sebastiaan Debrouwere
text: We use @attio on a daily basis for several internal processes, and I cannot rave enough about them. Incredibly flexibility and features combined with super intuitive UI.

name: Alon
text: I think this depends heavily on company size, GTM motion, size of sales team, etc... As an early stage startup I'm really loving using @attio - great balance of flexibility and prescriptiveness

name: Dimitry Gershenson
text: We use our CRM @attio for sales, fundraising, and recruiting. It's awesome

name: Jane Doe
text: Just started with @attio and it's already a game changer for our team. The UI is clean and the features are powerful. Highly recommend!

name: Mike Ross
text: Switching to @attio was the best decision we made this year. Customer support is top-notch and the product just works.
